title: Adaptive Blended MOOC Design for Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and practical experience in educational settings
context.additional_context: Immersive Learning Experience Through VR Simulation in a Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Environment

learning_goals: Learners can execute teacher leadership skills applicable to real classroom situations with over 80% accuracy through VR-based simulations.
Learners achieve a completion rate of over 75% in adaptive content tailored to their individual learning levels.
Learners can develop three or more classroom management strategies through collaborative activities with peer teachers in blended learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
